results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: «ሰው በዚያ ቀን መሸሻው የት ነው?» ይላል፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በዚያ ቀን መርጊያው ወደ ጌታህ ብቻ ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ሰው በዚያ ቀን ባስቀደመውና ባስቆየው ሁሉ ይነገራል፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርግጥም ሰው በነፍሱ ላይ አስረጅ ነው፡፡ (አካሎቹ ይመሰክሩበታል)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
